A project of the Digital Humanities Interest Group of the Music Library Association

A Directory of Digital Scholarship in Music.

Welcome. On this website you can browse or search an open-source bibliography of specialized digital resources and born-digital scholarship in music.

Please see our Call for Collaboration on October 12, 2021 to update the directory with projects from the past three years.

To learn more about the project, please consult our Frequently Asked Questions, select Browse or Search on our navigation menu above, or simply begin exploring one item at a time by clicking on this link.
